ac_angle_in_radians.description: Return frequency in radians per second. Otherwise, Hertz.

damp_initial.description: Damp the initial 20 iterations of the Raphson method.

default_integration_scheme.description: Controls which implicit integration method is used in the transient.

output_directory.description: Directory in which the output data files will be stored

transient_max_iterations.description: Maximum number of iterations per transient step.

use_gmin_stepping.description: Apply the gmin stepping solving method when solving for an OP.

use_source_stepping.description: Apply source stepping when solving for an OP.
